graphs
Class Phi0EstimateData

java.lang.Object
  graphs.Phi0EstimateData
public class Phi0EstimateData
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps track of the data necessary to graph an estimate of Phi_0 in the Phi0Histogram class.

Author:
Ian Terrell

          An array containing a count of how many walkers are in each bin.
